summary.text: Fly token verification blocked: GitHub Actions secrets cannot be accessed from local environment

errors.message: Cannot access ${{ secrets.FLY_TOKEN_PAY_READY }} from local shell - requires GitHub Actions runner context

context.operation: GraphQL query to Fly.io viewer organizations
